DOC.brief_summary: 18F-Alfatide Ⅱ PET/CT in breast cancer patients
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Research of 18F-Alfatide Ⅱ PET/CT in Breast Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators aim to assess the clinical application of 18F-Alfatide Ⅱ PET/CT in the diagnosis and treatment response monitoring of breast cancer.
DOC.criteria: The patients have been suspected or diagnosed with breast cancer and they have not received any treatment; It must fulfill the ethical requirements and subjects have signed an informed consent. Pregnancy or nursing mothers; Those patients accompanied by other serious diseases such as cardiac functional insufficiency, hepatic and renal function insufficiency.
